SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into api_user_invoice (manager_id, invoice_type, invoice_title_type, taxpayer, taxpayer_number, ticket_collector_mobile, ticket_collector_email, create_time, update_time, in_use) values (#{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceTitleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxpayer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxpayerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketCollectorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketCollectorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inUse,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id,manager_id as managerId,invoice_type as invoiceType, invoice_title_type as invoiceTitleType, taxpayer as taxpayer,taxpayer_number as taxpayerNumber , ticket_collector_mobile as ticketCollectorMobile, ticket_collector_email as ticketCollectorEmail, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from api_user_invoice where manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and in_use =1

select id,manager_id as managerId,invoice_type as invoiceType, invoice_title_type as invoiceTitleType, taxpayer as taxpayer,taxpayer_number as taxpayerNumber , ticket_collector_mobile as ticketCollectorMobile, ticket_collector_email as ticketCollectorEmail, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from api_user_invoice where manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and in_use =1 ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1
